sections.description:
Plugin platform for managing fitness and nutrition coaching content.

We recommend using this plugin in conjunction with the Paid Memberships Pro plugin, and the PMPro Sequences plugin.
sections.changelog:
Change Log

  1. 0.8.4 - Didn't always add a new default assignment for the article.
    Didn't always load the correct status for the assignment.
  2. 0.8.3 - Fix numerous issues when listing [daily_progress type='assignment'] output
  3. 0.8.2 - Fix program data load and add highlight around lesson complete button in daily assignment.
  4. 0.8.1 - Fix: Correctly handle next weeks activity archive.
  5. 0.8.0 - Enh: e20r_activity_archive shortcode support
  6. 0.7.1 - Bumped to test auto-update
  7. 0.7.0 - Added automatic update functionality
